Content: <h2 id="1f74" class="fm fn dc bk bj fo de fp dg fq fr fs ft fu fv fw fx" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 37px;">Namesilo 简介</h2> <p id="e504" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph=""><a class="at cg gr gs gt gu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; background-color: transparent; color: #e91e63; text-decoration-line: none; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;" href="https://www.namesilo.com/?rid=aecc848vc" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer">Namesilo</a> 是 ICANN 认证的国际著名域名注册商之一，<span class="md_line" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">价格便宜实惠、性价比高</span>，注册和转入域名都很方便，安全保护到位，是一家非常靠谱的域名注册商。</p> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph=""><strong style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">注意：</strong></p> <ol style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin-top: 0px; margin-bottom: 30px; line-height: 1.618; font-size: 18px; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;"> <li style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">部分网友反馈支付宝付款后域名列表为空，请发工单需要联系客服；</li> <li style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">如果中文不好，或者打开网页很慢，建议到国内的阿里云、腾讯云、百度云等网站去注册。国内买域名的<strong style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">缺点主要是需要实名认证(要上传身份证)、可供注册的顶级域名数量少</strong>。注册域名后设置dns解析到vps的ip也一样能使用。</li> </ol> <h3 class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 32px;">Namesilo有如下优点：</h3> <h4 id="3074" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 27px;"><strong class="ga gv" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">1. 价格便宜稳定，无套路</strong></h4> <p id="2b34" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">Namesilo 域名本身价格就比较便宜，com域名 8.99刀每年(几乎市场最低价)，除了一个一美元新手优惠码(优惠码 <code class="gw gx gy gz ha b prettyprinted" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: Menlo, Monaco, Consolas, 'Courier New', monospace; font-size: 16.2px; padding: 2px 4px; color: #c7254e; background-color: #f9f2f4; border-radius: 4px;"><span class="pln" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">hijk</span></code>，订单金额需大于1刀)，基本没有其他大幅度促销活动，域名续费和首年购买价格一致。</p> <p id="faf4" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">某些域名注册商就套路满满，首年极其便宜（例如1刀），先套住你再说。但续费很贵（15刀），隐私保护还要额外收费 ，续费不可以使用优惠码。如果不对比其他家，你甚至都发现不了这些套路。</p> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;">Namesilo价格表：<a class="at cg gr gs gt gu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; background-color: transparent; color: #e91e63; text-decoration-line: none; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;" href="https://www.namesilo.com/pricing.php?rid=aecc848vc" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow noreferrer">Domain Pricing</a></p> <h4 id="c1c4" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 27px;"><strong class="ga gv" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">2. 永久免费的隐私保护</strong></h4> <p id="3c48" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph=""><a style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; background-color: transparent; color: #e91e63; text-decoration-line: none; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;" href="https://www.namesilo.com/?rid=aecc848vc" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer">Namesilo</a> 提供永久免费的域名隐私保护，防止别人通过 WHOIS 查询获取域名所有者的个人注册信息。作为对比，Godaddy 的隐私保护是 60 元/年。</p> <h4 id="8521" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 27px;"><strong class="ga gv" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">3. 安全性高</strong></h4> <p id="0898" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">支持账户登陆二次验证和 Domain Defender，保护账户和域名安全。登陆、解锁域名等，可以设置邮件或短信提醒。</p> <h4 id="e5ef" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 27px;"><strong class="ga gv" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent;">4. 支付方便</strong></h4> <p id="7b3b" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gm gd gn gf go gh gp gj gq gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">支持支付宝、Paypal、信用卡等多种方式付款。</p> <h3 style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; font-family: 默认; font-weight: 500; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 32px;">Namesilo的缺点：</h3> <p id="ec2f" class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">1. 网站后台风格过时简陋，功能繁多，面板功能不好找；</p> <p class="fy fz dc bk ga b gb gc gd ge gf gg gh gi gj gk gl cu" style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">2. 没有中文界面；</p> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">3. 自带的DNS解析生效很慢，TTL最低3600秒(可以<a style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; background-color: transparent; color: #e91e63; text-decoration-line: none; transition: all 0.3s ease 0s;" href="https://www.hijk.pw/use-cloudflare-unlock-blocked-ip/#change-dns">切换到免费CloudFlare</a>解决)。</p> <p style="box-sizing: border-box; -webkit-tap-highlight-color: transparent; margin: 0px 0px 15px; font-size: 18px; line-height: 1.618; color: #3c4858; font-family: Roboto, Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif;" data-selectable-paragraph="">接下来让我们进入域名注册的流程吧！</p>
Title: Namesilo购买域名详细教程
